name: @mahdijz5/nestjs-amqp-advanced
description: NestJS RabbitMQ Advanced Config is a custom package designed to extend the capabilities of NestJS for integrating with RabbitMQ. While NestJS provides basic RabbitMQ integration through the @nestjs/microservices package, this custom package offers advanced configuration options for users who require more flexibility and control over their RabbitMQ setup.
